hackathon-description-text: Hacktech is the West Coast's premier interdisciplinary hackathon! 500 of the nations best programmers, engineers, and scientists will collaborate to make innovative projects in 36-hours!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Professor of Computing and Mathematical Sciences & Machine Learning Researcher at Caltech
CEO of StatSketch & Director of Caltech Alumni Board
Account Access Team Engineer at Facebook

hackathon-rules: We expect all hackers to adhere to the MLH Code of Conduct (http://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf).

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team will receive a unrestricted JetBrains license for a tool of their choice, a Google Cardboard, an Ardunio Uno Ultimate Starter Kit, and a Dell Venue 10 Tablet from MLH!
Each member of the winning team will receive an unrestricted JetBrains license for a tool of their choice, and a Misfit Flash Fitness and Sleep Smartwatch.
Each member of the winning team will receive an unrestricted JetBrains license for a tool of their choice and a 8-GB WiFi Enabled Kindle Fire.
Each member of the winning team will receive a Bitalino Medical Sensor Kit.
Each member of the winning team will receive a Pebble Time Smartwatch.
$500 in Postmates credits to be split amongst members of the winning team
Each member of the winning team will receive: 1 Raspberry Pi, $100, 1 year access to Wolfram Alpha Pro, and 1 year access to the Producer level of the Wollfram Development Platform.
Each member of the winning team will be given $125 in cash. Each member is also encouraged to donate a portion of their winnings to a charity of their choice!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Caltech Fund Social Good Prize [Caltech Fund]

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team will be given $2,500 to be split amongst team members.
Winning team will be given $2,500 to be split amongst team members.
Each member of the winning team will receive a gift voucher for $30. The prize will go to the best hack hosted on a .TECH domain.
Each member of the winning team will receive a Surface Pro 3.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Overall Use of Microsoft Technology

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will share a UDI 818A Quadcopter Drone with HD Camera.
The winning team will share a Boosted Board.
Each member of the winning team will receive a 1 TB Hard Drive, courtesy of MLH!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services (AWS)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Kick-ass trophy of Mona the Octocat by MLH!
Each member of the winning team will receive a Skeye Mini Drone with HD Camera!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Big Data, Machine Learning, or Data Processing by Taboola

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $500 in Postmates credits to be split amongst members of the winning team
Each member of the winning team will receive: 1 Raspberry Pi, $100, 1 year access to Wolfram Alpha Pro, and 1 year access to the Producer level of the Wollfram Development Platform.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=600 S Holliston Ave, Pasadena, CA 91106, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How usable is your hack in its current state? Strive to create a functioning project even if it doesn't have a ton of features!
Does your hack combine principles from across different fields? Live up to our theme and make a hack that explore the intersection of computer science with other fields!
How creative is your hack? Try to approach the problem you are trying to solve from a novel angle!
Is your hack polished? Create a streamlined hack that looks as great as it functions!

hackathon-location-address: 600 S Holliston Ave, Pasadena, CA 91106, USA
hackathon-description-header: The West Coast's Premier Interdisciplinary Hackathon!
